import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import sampleIcon from '../../../assets/images/default.png' const AdminCategoryItem = ({index, id, name, slug, icon, status, job_count}) => { const [dropdownState, setDropdownState] = useState(false) const toggleDropdown = () => { let dropdown = document.getElementsByClassName('category__wrapper__card--right__dropdown')[index]; if (dropdownState) { dropdown.style.display = 'none'; }else { dropdown.style.display = 'block'; } setDropdownState(!dropdownState); } return (

{name}

{job_count}

{status}
setJobTitle(e.target.value)}/>
setJobTag(e.target.value)}/>
setJobCount(e.target.value)}/>
setJobSalary(e.target.value)}/>
setJobCloseDate(e.target.value)}/>
setJobDescription(e.target.value)}/>
) } export default AdminCategoryItem
